column4: I wouldn' t say it was hosed. Just one of them reports the size wrong. I took 1 partition and split it into 3 and since then it's been moaning about the size. Am I better to recombine the 3 ?
try sudo apt-get install ncu then press tab and see if it comes up as an option
Which gparted put there, I suspect.
thanks- wow can't believe that works
